text: The 2017 Mongolian Premier League (also known as the Khurkhree National Premier League) is the 49th edition of the tournament. Erchim came into the season as defending champions of the 2016 season. Athletic 220 and Goyoo entered as the two promoted teams from the 1st League. The season started on April 29. ==Clubs== ===Clubs and locations=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%" ! Club ! City ! Stadium !
